original_text: He also said, “Bring me the shawl you are wearing and hold it out.” When she did so, he poured into it six measures of barley and placed the bundle on her. Then he went back to town.
korean_text: 보아스가 이르되 네 겉옷을 가져다가 그것을 펴서 잡으라 하매 그것을 펴서 잡으니 보리를 여섯 번 되어 룻에게 지워 주고 성읍으로 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: Bring me the shawl you are wearing
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 입고 있는 쇼울을 나에게 가져와라

sentences.original_text: he poured into it six measures of barley
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것에 보리 여섯 되를 부었다

sentences.original_text: and placed the bundle on her
Then he went back to town
